title: "Artificial intelligence, diabetes experts combine forces for blood sugar management study"
excerpt: "To help the estimated 1.45 million Americans living with type 1 diabetes better manage their blood sugar levels, Oregon Health & Science University is combining the power of an artificial intelligence-driven smartphone app with the support of human experts."
